text: In the Nick of Time is a 1991 Christmas television film by George T. Miller. In the Nick of Time may also refer to: * In the Nick of Time (1911 film), a 1911 Australian silent film by Alfred Rolfe * In the Nick of Time (Australian film) or Let George Do It, a 1938 comedy starring George Wallace * In the Nick of Time (album), an album by Nicolette Larson * In the Nick of Time, a 1929 Vitaphone short with Dorothy Hall ==See also== * Nick of Time (disambiguation)
title: In the Nick of Time (disambiguation)
